room_title: Escape room "Poltergeist" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
review: It was my first time doing an escape room, i had so much fun! Can’t wait to go back. I would definitely recommend doing it. Oh did I mention I escaped?!

room_title: Escape room "Poltergeist" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
review: Great time for a group of a people at a reasonable price! Definitely recommend!!

room_title: Escape room "Poltergeist" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
review: Although I didn’t escape from the poltergeist room I will say that it was so well done. From the game to the decor/theme! Will definitely be back!
